choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Subject: Requesting Time Off

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to request a leave of absence from the company effective immediately. I have been considering this decision for some time and feel that it is necessary for me to take a break at this point in my career. 

As you may know, I have been with the company for [number of years] and have dedicated most of my time and energy towards achieving our goals and objectives. However, due to personal reasons, I need to take some time off to recharge and spend quality time with my family.

I understand that this may cause some inconvenience and disruption in our work routine, but please be assured that I will do everything possible to minimize the impact on our team's progress and productivity. During this leave of absence, I will ensure that all my responsibilities are taken care of and that my colleagues are informed of my whereabouts.

Thank you for your understanding and support during this transition period. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist with the transition or if you need any further information from me.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
